Articles.Content:
Has anyone flown an airplane on Jool? If so, I would like to see pictures.

pictures or it didnt happen.

Jet engines would be impossible, and rockets impractical, meaning you would need to glide rather than engage in powered flight. Eventually the Kraken would take hold

People have aerobraked with spaceplanes, but that's not really "flying."

I have by accident

I don't need pictures because it was a solar panel, a probe Core and 2 winglets. Managed to get it up to 200m/s

At 100m above the surface in jools atmosphere (terminal velocity was ~30m/s)
